context: Hi, how are you? I'm fine thanks! I am a huge Leonardo Dicaprio fan! Can you recommend any movies?
I'm doing great! I love Leonardo also. How about The Revenant (2015) ? Did you see that? It won awards.
YES!! It is my favorite movie actually! I also really enjoyed The Basketball Diaries (1995). Have you seen that?

Also, an oldie but goodie would be What's Eating Gilbert Grape (1993) . I think that movie was severely underrated. Dicaprio was amazing in that role. I have seen The Basketball Diaries (1995) . It was good. Oh, my ALL TIME FAVORITE Dicaprio movie has to be Catch Me If You Can (2002) .
Oh yeah, those really good as well! I also really loved Shutter Island (2010).
resp: I know most people would say Titanic (1997) , but I like Catch Me If You Can (2002) even better. Awesome movies. Do you think you have something to see out of that list?

context.content: Hello
Hi! What kind of movies do you like?
I'm into thrilling and adrenaline-pumping action movies, as well as suspenseful and intense criminal films. I also enjoy suspenseful thrillers with gripping suspense. Any recommendations?
context.feelings: I love unexpected movie recommendations that turn out to be enjoyable. It's always a pleasant surprise to discover new movies that I end up loving.

context.content: Have you seen The Silence of the Lambs (1991)?
I haven't seen it. Can you tell me more about The Silence of the Lambs (1991)?
context.feelings: I'm pleasantly surprised by the recommendation. I didn't expect a criminal film, but it sounds intense and suspenseful. I wonder if it has enough action to keep me on the edge of my seat. The recommender seems to understand my love for unexpected suggestions. I appreciate their effort in finding something that might interest me.

context.content: It's about a group of people that are trying to track down a serial killer. It's really good.
That sounds interesting, but I'm really looking for something with more adrenaline-pumping action. Do you have any other recommendations?
context.feelings: I like the idea of tracking down a serial killer, but I'm not sure if it has the adrenaline-pumping action I'm looking for. The recommender is doing a good job, but I need something more thrilling.
